description: The Duc d`Orléans is a powerful noble of royal blood with ambitions to the throne of France. He has been associating with occultists such as the Comte de Saint-Germain to achieve his goals. His character is loosely based on Philippe II, Duc d`Orléans (1674-1723) who served as regent to Louis XV until he reached majority in 1723.
name: Duc d`Orleans
